string.text: What are you doing here?
And how do you think?
Searching for artifacts?

Well, you're a quick-witted one, not a bad place, abundant in anomalies, we had been collecting artifacts here and we're now involved in some searches. The only thing is to be careful, as this place is ful of militaries.
А ты знаешь?

Конечно знаю, иначе что я бы делал там, где артефактов хороших отродясь не было? Есть у меня информация, где можно узнать о том, как к центру Зоны проникнуть. Если ты заинтересовать - могу продать. Две тысячи всего. Сам понимаешь, в центре зоны столько артефактов, что эти две тысячи ты за час заработаешь.
Хорошо, беру.
По рукам.
Договорились. Только осторожнее, не подставляй свою задницу под пули. Хе-хе. Ценю людей с чувством юмора. Забери тысячу назад. Купишь себе трусы попрочнее. Ха-ха.
Нет, спасибо.
Ну, как знаешь.
Walking?
You're funny, ideed. We're working here, Canaries are dedicated for walking. Recently we "worked" with the militaries. And in case you ask too many questions we'll work with you as well.
Putting your arses under the bullets?

He-he. I see you're the boy of humor. I appreciate this. Such guys are seldom to be met in the Zone. The rest are sort of gloomy ones, they should be glad of every day they lived, while eventually they are always afraid of death.
I don't know.
How come, that you don't know? When you will have survived in the Zone for as long as I had, you'll find out what people are doing here.
Thanks for your help, stalker! If it weren't for your timely help, I would have been dead for now.
What are you doing in here?
Sitting and putting our backs under the bullets. Ask Mole for details. He's a chief here.
Gosh! It was a mayhem here, I won't bear this to the enemy. Those militaries are really becoming impudent.
Where is Agroprom RI situated?
Not far from here. Walk the road to the West - it leads straightly to one of the Institute's gates.
Who is located on Institute's terrotory?
How is it better to get in there?
Thanks.

There you might find the largest military base, that I've ever heard of. I'm not up on how many of them are there, but my experience says that it's not less than a platoon there. They are well armed, and you won't succeed in breaking through, but if you decide - they'll eliminate you without any hesitation.

It's better to be penetrated at night, but I guess that the base is heavily guarded at night, they've got outposts everywhere. Whatch for the schedule of guards relieve, then you'll have a real chance to get into the territory undetected and leave it the same way.
Heard anything about the Gunslinger's cache?
Yeah, I even know where it is, you've helped me and I'll provide you information on what you are interested in.\nTake this flahs-drive, it contains everything I know.
Thanks for the info, you are not used to deceive me, aren't you? I don't like to be betrayed, I hope there will be no necessity to come back for you!
You've come with help, it follows that I'm not going to deceive you whatever. \nAnyway, if you consider me deceiving you, you'll find me and beat my phiz! Deal?
Okay, I'll do as you say, but I haven't made you say that!
I've saved you. Tell me, what are you doing here?
Stalker, thanks for your help, I own you my life. My team and I have found a decent place here to collect artifacts, we've got a base at the factory.
Artifacts? Why then the militaries attacked you? I can hardly believe that it was over the artifacts!
Yes, exactly artifacts. I don't know why they attacked us. I'm only trying to survive in this complicated world!
Tell me what: do you know anything about the stalker named Gunslinger?
Yes, I've heard about him, he was likely to make his living in these places, it's pretty good place here. But he has gone long ago, I don't know exactly when and where. I don't know anything more.
I've saved you! Tell me, you weren't sitting here with no purpose, were you? Otherwise, why have the military spec. forces landed here?
Well, I know something more about the Gunslinger.
Yeah? I do need to know this!

I've got an information about the location of the Gunslinger's cache!\n\nTruly the cache is located not at the factory, but under it! Can you see this hole? This is one of the entrances to the tunnels under the factory, and I don't even know the exact size of the dungeons, but the Cache is somewhere there!
How can I find the cache?
As a sign of gratitude I give you the flash-drive containing the information, look into everything further on your own.
If you have deceived me, I'm gonna find you, and finish what the militaries couldn't!
I don't deceive you. I know that no one believes no one here, but you've got a short choice here.
You're right, have to go, cheers!
Grey told me, that you knew something about Gunslinger's cache!

As far as you are Grey's friend, then it turns out that you are a friend of mine as well, especially after the turmoil with the militaries. If it were not for your help, I guess I would be the lunch for the blind dogs.
Okay-okay. So what is with the cache?

I know where the Gunslinger's cache is situated. It is right here at the Agroprom, or better to say under it. Tunnels are everywhere, they lead under the factory and not only there. But as for myself, I haven't got any desire to go there - I'll have to save my ass from the militaries, cure the wounds. Go there yourself if you wish to. I'll copy the information on your PDA.
How can I get into the tunnels?

This is one of the many entrances, you'll get into one of the tunnels through it, and then do as you like, I've got no map of these tunnels, while they're very long with the abundance of rooms and rather tangled.
What else do you know?
I know nothing more, I've already told you everything I knew, you'll have to act further on your own. Wish you good luck.
I have to go, take care!!!
Tell me about Gunslinger and his grouping?

I've heard various rumors! It's said that he was camping at that factory, searching for some gizmo, and when he found it, he went down to the center of the Zone. But the poor fellow reached the depth, and has never been seen again. As for the guys who accompanied him has also been never seen. There are most likely to be deceased, half a year has passed since that time.
Thanks
Where is Agroprom Research Insitute situated?
Not far from here, walk along the road up, it will lead you to the factory's enterance. I've written info about the factory's dislocation for you.
Who is located on the Institute's territory?
How is it better to penetrate it?

There is the largest military base in this region. I don't have a clue how many of them are there, but my experience says that the amount is not less than one platoon, and this is at least 16 men. They are well-armed and you won't succeed in breaking through straight in the front. They'll knock you down, without any hesitation.

It's better to sneak in there at night, but I assume the base is well guarded, with many posts on alert. Look for the timetable of watch switch, then you'll have a real chance to slip into there silently and undetected and leave it the same way.
Straight to the point, Grey told me, that you've got a flash-drive with the data about the dislocation of Gunslinger's cache!
For your help, I'll tell you, Grey hasn't deceived you, here is a flash-drive with the info about the location of Gunslinger's cache.
Nice one.
Help!
Alright!
What is that hole in the ground?
It's an entrance to the dungeon.
What about this dungeon?
How do you think is it dangerous in the dungeons?
Is there anything valuable?
These are the service tunnels they stretch overbelow the whole factory's territory, and its outskirts, don't know exactly how far. But I can asure you, that they are very long and tangled.

Yes, it's really dangerous there. But you're not the one who is afraid of rats, aren't you? Actually I don't advise you to poke your nose there without a flashlight! And don't forget to take bullets and then take few more!
There is an abundance of different goods. I guess that if you crawl it through, you will be able to find many interesting things.
Don't shoot, bro!
Who are you?
I'm Eye.
What are you doing here?
And what's your business in it?
Just asking, don't get too excited.

Awright, I'm coming from the factory, which lies westwards straight by the road. I don't know how, but our group has been detected by the militaries. I didn't expect for their return and left. Hopefully our guys has already fleed, otherwise they won't survive for long.
Clear, thanks.
What interesting is happening here?
Do you know about Ratsnarer? The information will cost you 30 bucks.
Deal.
There is a local heroe here, named Ratsnarer. He inhabits the bogs. He bred so many rats in the collectors that they will soon eat the cops alive.
Great. Thanks.
Tell me about the collectors in detail.
Collectors... Yes, usual stinky sewer system. Drains the waste waters from Agroprom to the nearest reservoir.
Great. Cheers. Take care.
I know. Thanks.
There is nothing more I can tell you.
I haven't got sufficient funds.
I'm not intersted in it.
What interesting is happening here?
Nothing at all.
Got it. Cheers!
I've got several questions.
Have you heard about the Ratsnarer? Information will cost you a 30.
What do you want to know?
Where can I have a peaceful rest?
What's interesting here?
Deal.
We have a local heroe here, namely Ratsnarer. He lives on the bogs. He has bred so many rats, that they'll sooner or later eat the militaries alive.
Perfect. Thanks.
Tell me about the collectors in detail.
Collectors... Well, common stinky sewerage system. It turns off the agroprom's sewers to the nearest reservoir.
Great. Cheers. Take care.
I know that. Thanks.
How many do you require?
There is nothing more I can tell you.
I haven't got enough money.
Here, take money, tell me where it is.
Ah, screw you...
I'm not interested in that.
Thanks.
Yeah, there is a place! But you'll have to pay a fair bit!

Everything was calm and quiet recently. And now for some reason the militaries have blown up. They kill everyone. They've driven out bandits not long ago. Someone is said to made their way to the catacombs.
What interesting things are happening in here?
Well, thirty and we're done?
Nothing at all.
Clear. Cheers!

There is car at the radioactive bog, it's possible to settle there for a while. However the territory around it is radiated, it's better to approach to the car from the western swamp side. And one more thing: we've recently seen a soldier there, apparently from the Intitute's base. He has been camping there for several days. Perhaps, he has flied off the handle - he's gonna die there alone.
Cheers!
Tell me about this place.

This is the territory of Agroptom Research Institute. The building itself is situated on the south-west. And the large factory to the north - is the manufacturing and technology base of the institute. The building have been abandoned for a long time, they've passed in momories, there is nothing to steal from them whatsoever. But recently militaries started to search for something actively.
Tell me about the institute in detail.

This is a legendary institute. Until the catastrophe in 1986 there was only the lone standing building of Gramineae selection and genetics institute. And there were experimental field on the place of the factory. After the accident the insitute has been closed, and the field were burned. And then they remembered, whitewashed the building, fenced it, built barracks. Erected the factory on the fields. I don't have a clue what where they doing in that institute, but they didn't spare money, this I'm telling you.
Tell me about the factory in detail.

This factory has been built in the end of 80s. Supposedly with the aim to build and check the cars, which are capable to work up the radioactive soil. But as far as I know, no one has seen a single car. Now it's totally empty. Only stalkers like to stop there. It's said that this place is quite a safe one if not to poke a nose into the dark corners.
Thanks.
O! Humanlike has come! What have brought you here?
Hello.
What have you come here for?
Tell me about the collector. How can I get in, where are the entrances and exits?

It's rather dangerous in collector now. Six entrances. Two of them are on the Institute's territory - where the military base is. Institute's territory is patrolled. Captain has got the patrol schedule.
Where have you got all this information from?
Rats know the rumors.
Clear. See you. Good luck.
I've got nothing. See you.
Who are you?
I live here. If this stuff can be called life. I'm breeding rats in collectors, bothering militaries in the Institute this way.
I'm Ratsnarer.
What are you doing in this swamp?
Aaaa... got it... Unfortunately I'm not a character of this fairy tale.\nHehehe...
What are you, greengorn, doing here?
What have you come here for?
Tell me about the collector. How to get into it, where are the enters and the exits?

It's dangerous in collector now. Six ways to enter. Two of them - on the territory of the institute, where the military's base is located. Institute's territory is heavily patroled. The schedule of patrols can be found at the captain's.
Where have you got this much information from?
Rats know the rumors.
Clear. Cheers. Good luck.
Ни с чем. До встречи.
Ты кто?
Живу здесь. Если это можно жизнью назвать. А так, развожу крыс в коллекторе, тем самым донимаю военных в институте.
Я Крысолов.
Что ты делаешь в этом болоте?
I'm hiding. I don't want any problem. Please, don't shoot!
How did you get here? Whom are you hiding from? Say!
What are the catacombs?
А... понятно.... я в общем не из этой сказки.\nХа-ха-ха...
What can you tell me about your base?
What are you planning to do next?
Well, you may camp here, I'm not going to kill you. Don't you dare to die of hunger.

I'm from the reconnaissance detachment. We've been sent to the collectors, in order to examine what was happening under the base. There is a total mess. The others are most likely to be dead. But I have no desire to get back to the base. They always cut all ways for us in the Zone, damn bastards.
Underground tunnels. They lead from the Institute outside its territory, I'll show you the exits. The maps of the catacombs themselves aren't in my posession.

I can draft the guard plan for you. I'll also mark the captain's cab on the map - he's scum indeed. If you want to break your way to the base, listen to what I'm gonna tell you, my lad: gates are virtually impassable, the most appropriate way is through that damn catacombs. And one more thing: the main building is usually empty during the watch switch.
Hem. I don't know. According to the military laws I'm supposed to be a deserter. I'll hide my ass for a while.
